It is a beautifully designed Finance application for .NET MAUI Markup(No XAML) enthusiasts. Made with [FmgLib.MauiMarkup](https://github.com/FmgLib/FmgLib.MauiMarkup).

## Images Preview
![Project mockup](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/73774639/332191803-16edcdd5-b31d-4233-b190-ea978ffefea2.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..XqKNI0VhW_FI6BSWLCdYdeJMXdjZNb3OgcgDP6QUHYw)

## Platforms
iOS, Android

## Features
- FmgLib.MauiMarkup
- SQLite
- NET MAUI Community Toolkit
- Community Toolkit Mvvm
- DevExpress Maui
- LiveCharts
- AutoMapper
- MVVM

## More Information
- Author: [Mustafa Gönültaş](https://github.com/gonultasmf)
- Source Code: https://github.com/gonultasmf/MyFinance
